items.sentence: Tom went back to his car to get something that he forgot.
When the visitor entered the room, we stood to greet him.
There were thirty people on the bus including the driver.
Tom would cry every time his father would leave the room.
Tom walked out of the store, carrying a box full of food.
Tom didn't seem to understand anything that you told him.
Tom said that he and his wife went to Boston last summer.
Tom was thirteen years old when his parents got divorced.
Tom looked through the trash, trying to find the receipt.
I want to be able to play the violin as well as Tom does.
